method.name: .scrollTo()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description:
Performs scrolling the page using the parameters passed (or the default).

The selector passed can be an exists element or one of the this words: 'top','right','bottom','left'

easing.description: Type of easing to animate the window

scrollx.description: Enable animation on the X axis

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .random()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Randomly choose one or more elements from a selection of elements

count.description: Number of elements inside of __ELEMENT__ to keep

remove.description: Discriminate if elements inside will be hidded (false) or removed (true)

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .getEvents()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Return a map with all elements selected: each of these is object with a two attributes: "el" and "events"

method.name: jQuery.hash()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Return a int hash of string

string.description: The string to convert in int hash

method.name: .hash()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Return a int hash of the value of element

method.name: .MD5()
method.author: Paul Johnston, Greg Holt
method.description: Return a string cripted with MD5 method

method.name: .getAllStyle()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Return an object with all style css of the element

method.name: .setPositionTo()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Set the position of element(s) to another element

target.description: If element destination has the value ":reset" elemenets return in original position

animate.type: Boolean False or map for specificing an easing and/or duration of animation

my.description: String with x and y coordinates with respect to elements

at.description: String with x and y coordinates with respect to the target

offset.description: Map with top and left offset

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .tooltip()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Show near the element a tooltip

The method to execute:
  • create: Create a HTML code of Tooltip and append it to body
  • setContent: Set the content of Tooltip
  • show: Show the Tooltip
  • hide: Hide the Tooltip
  • remove: Remove the HTML code of Tooltip
  • attach: Call "Create" and "setContent" methods and attach "mouseover" and "mouseleave" events

side.description: The side of element will be positioned Tooltip

position.description: The position rispect a side (can be "left,center,right" if the side is set to "top or bottom", "top,center,bottom" if the side is set to "left or right")

offset.description: Object with two attributes, "top" and "left", represents the custom offset to be applied to the tooltip

classes.description: List of classes to associate a Tooltip (separated from spaces)

showArrow.description: Discriminate if the arrow will be show or hide

useMousePosition.description: Discriminate if the Tooltip will be positioning at mouse position

animation.description: For specificing an easing and/or duration of animation

callbacks.description: Map of callbacks to call before and/or after each method, the name of callback is "Before[methodname]" and "After[methodname]"

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .check()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Check the value with params passed, in ".check()" declaration will be used the value of the element

value.description: Value to check with the type

subtype.description: A specific subcategory of the type (view list for more info)

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .tips()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Show a tip

classes.description: List of classes to associate a tip (separated from spaces)

position.description: String with position rispect a window

offset.description: Object with two attributes, top and left, custom offset

animation.description: For specificing an easing and/or duration of animation

closing.description: Function execute when called a "close" method

method.description: Method to execute

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .sakebuttons()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Converter a checkbox in Apple's button

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.description: The method to execute

interval.description: Interval in milliseconds that will be checked the content of the element

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .loop()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Execute the function passed a finite number of times (or infinity)

howmany.description: How many the function will be execute

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .lorem()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Write in the __ELEMENT__ of paragraphs of Lorem

random.description: Discriminate if the paragraph to print is chosen randomly

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .replace()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Replace all occurrences of "__search__" with "__replacement__" inside the element

search.description: The string or regular expression to search

modifier.description: The regular expression modifier to use

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .rgbToHex()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Converter a RGB color to HEX

method.name: .hexToRgb()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Convert a HEX color to RGB

return_string.description: Discriminate if the return value will be Object (false) of String (true)

method.name: .escape()
method.author: Salvatore Caputi, Kevin Lucich
method.description: Returns the string escaped by special characters (even the selectors for jQuery), in ".escape()" declaration will be used the value of the element

method.name: .validate()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Valid fields in a box (conteiner), using a rules passed or specified inline

showTooltip.description: Discriminate if a Tooltip with error will be show

showRules.description: If set print in console a list of rules for validation

tooltipOnFocus.description: Discriminate if the tooltip will be show only when the input catch focus

rules.description: Map of rules of each element to check

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .sakelightbox()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Create and show a lightbox

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .trim()
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Replace the value of element with the value trimmed and return it

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .show()
method.author: jQuery Foundation
method.description: This is the function written by jQuery foundation, but extended for send two trigger: before and after when the animation was executed

method.name: .hide()
method.author: jQuery Foundation
method.description: This is the function written by jQuery foundation, but extended for send two trigger: before and after when the animation was executed

method.name: .template
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Copy a strcture of element selected (called template), and insert the data passed searching the attribute data-info

selector.description: Specified the selector where will print the template

data.description: Map of data to insert into template (before print it). The keys of map are the values of "data-info" into HTML tags, the value of the element in map will be insert into tag, can be a mixed value type: also a function! In case value of element is a function, the value returned will be insert into the tag.

appendTo.description: Specfied if the template will be append to the selector or not (content of destination element will be cancel)

extraData.description: If you have specified a function in a map item, this array will be available in the arguments of the specified function. Warning: the first argument will always be the data passed to the method ".template()", then in order find the data of the parameter "ExtraData." See examples to understand better.

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

includeMargin.description: A Boolean indicating whether to include the element's margin in the calculation.

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

includeMargin.description: A Boolean indicating whether to include the element's margin in the calculation.

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method

method.name: .getDataInfo
method.author: Kevin Lucich
method.description: Returns an object with value of fields inside the $container. The key of object is the value in the attribute "data-info" of the field, it can be a "path": multi string separated with a "delimiter" string

delimiter.description: The string that defines a key on the other hand, the key is the value of input "data-info" attribute

ignoreHidden.description: If true, the fields hidden will not be catched

types.description: An object with the custom types of field value. This information is the value of attribute "data-type"

debug.description: If true, enable the debug mode into the method, print in console warnings or errors occurred

params.description: A map of additional options to pass to the method
